attributes.action: lower the upper time limit for abortions from 24 weeks to at least 15 weeks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment the upper time limit for an abortion is 24 weeks. At this stage the baby could, with medical help survive outside of the womb and in a hospital while one baby may be being laid on its side (left to die) doctors may be battling to save another one. At this stage the baby has finger, foot prints and has taste buds.
